classes.label: InferenceTaskError
description: Base class for all inference API errors.

functions.label: isChatCompletionChunkEvent
description: Check if the provided {@link ChatCompletionEvent} is a {@link ChatCompletionChunkEvent}

functions.label: isChatCompletionEvent
description: Check if the provided {@link InferenceTaskEvent} is a {@link ChatCompletionEvent}

functions.label: isChatCompletionMessageEvent
description: Check if the provided {@link ChatCompletionEvent} is a {@link ChatCompletionMessageEvent}

functions.label: isChatCompletionTokenCountEvent
description: Check if the provided {@link ChatCompletionEvent} is a {@link ChatCompletionMessageEvent}

functions.label: isInferenceError
description: Check if the given error is an {@link InferenceTaskError}

functions.label: isInferenceInternalError
description: Check if the given error is an {@link InferenceTaskInternalError}

functions.label: isInferenceRequestAbortedError
description: Check if the given error is an {@link InferenceTaskAbortedError}

functions.label: isInferenceRequestError
description: Check if the given error is an {@link InferenceTaskRequestError}

functions.label: isOutputCompleteEvent
description: Check if the provided {@link ChatCompletionEvent} is a {@link ChatCompletionChunkEvent}

functions.label: isOutputEvent
description: Check if the provided {@link InferenceTaskEvent} is a {@link OutputEvent}

functions.label: isOutputUpdateEvent
description: Check if the provided {@link OutputEvent} is a {@link OutputUpdateEvent}

functions.label: isTokenLimitReachedError
description: Check if an error is a {@link ChatCompletionTokenLimitReachedError}

functions.label: isToolNotFoundError
description: Check if an error is a {@link ChatCompletionToolNotFoundError}

functions.label: isToolValidationError
description: Check if an error is a {@link ChatCompletionToolValidationError}

functions.label: withoutChunkEvents
description: Operator filtering out the chunk events from the provided observable.

functions.label: withoutOutputUpdateEvents
description: Operator filtering out the update events from the provided observable.

functions.label: withoutTokenCountEvents
description: Operator filtering out the token count events from the provided observable.

interfaces.label: ChatCompleteResponse
description: Response from the {@link ChatCompleteAPI} when streaming is not enabled.

children.label: content
description: The text content of the LLM response.

children.label: toolCalls
description: The eventual tool calls performed by the LLM.

children.label: tokens
description: Token counts

interfaces.label: ChatCompletionChunkToolCall
description:
Represent a partial tool call present in a chunk event.

Note that all properties of the structure, except from the index,
are partial and must be aggregated.

children.label: index
description: The tool call index (position in the tool call array).

children.label: toolCallId
description: chunk of tool call id.

interfaces.label: ChatCompletionTokenCount
description: Token count structure for the chatComplete API.

children.label: prompt
description: Input token count

children.label: completion
description: Output token count

children.label: total
description: Total token count

interfaces.label: InferenceTaskEventBase
description: Base interface for all inference events.

children.label: type
description: Unique identifier of the event type.

interfaces.label: OutputOptions
description: Options for the {@link OutputAPI}

children.label: id
description: The id of the operation.

children.label: connectorId
description:
The ID of the connector to use.
Must be an inference connector, or an error will be thrown.

children.label: system
description: Optional system message for the LLM.

children.label: input
description: The prompt for the LLM.

children.label: schema
description: The schema the response from the LLM should adhere to.

children.label: previousMessages
description:
Previous messages in the conversation.
If provided, will be passed to the LLM in addition to `input`.

children.label: functionCalling
description: Function calling mode, defaults to "native".

children.label: stream
description:
Set to true to enable streaming, which will change the API response type from
a single promise to an event observable.

Defaults to false.

children.label: abortSignal
description: Optional signal that can be used to forcefully abort the request.

children.label: retry
description: Optional configuration for retrying the call if an error occurs.

interfaces.label: OutputResponse
description: Response from the {@link OutputAPI} when streaming is not enabled.

children.label: id
description: The id of the operation, as specified when calling the API.

children.label: output
description: The task output, following the schema specified as input.

children.label: content
description: Potential text content provided by the LLM, if it was provided in addition to the tool call.

interfaces.label: ToolCall
description: Represents a tool call performed by the LLM.

children.label: toolCallId
description: The id of the tool call, that must be re-used when providing the tool call response

children.label: function
signature: { name: TName; } & (TArguments extends Record<string, any> ? { arguments: TArguments; } : {})

interfaces.label: ToolDefinition
description: The definition of a tool that will be provided to the LLM for it to eventually call.

children.label: description
description:
A description of what the tool does. Note that this will be exposed to the LLM,
so the description should be explicit about what the tool does and when to call it.

children.label: schema
description:
The input schema for the tool, representing the shape of the tool's parameters

Even if optional, it is highly recommended to define a schema for all tool definitions, unless
the tool is supposed to be called without parameters.

interfaces.label: ToolOptions
description: Tool-related parameters of {@link ChatCompleteAPI}

children.label: toolChoice
description:
The choice of tool execution.

Refer to {@link ToolChoice}

children.label: tools
description:
The list of tool definitions that will be exposed to the LLM.

Refer to {@link ToolDefinition}.

interfaces.label: UnvalidatedToolCall
description:
Represents a tool call from the LLM before correctly converted to the schema type.

Only publicly exposed because referenced by {@link ChatCompletionToolValidationError}

enums.label: ChatCompletionErrorCode
description: List of code of error that are specific to the {@link ChatCompleteAPI}

enums.label: ChatCompletionEventType
description: List possible values of {@link ChatCompletionEvent} types.

enums.label: InferenceTaskErrorCode
description: Enum for generic inference error codes.

enums.label: MessageRole
description: Enum for all possible {@link Message} roles.

enums.label: OutputEventType
description: List possible values of {@link OutputEvent} types.

enums.label: ToolChoiceType
description:
Tool invocation choice type.

Refer to {@link ToolChoice} for more details.

misc.label: AssistantMessage
description: Represents a message from the LLM.

misc.label: AssistantMessageOf
description: Utility type to get the Assistant message type of a {@link ToolOptions} type.

misc.label: BoundChatCompleteAPI
description: Version of {@link ChatCompleteAPI} that got pre-bound to a set of static parameters

misc.label: BoundChatCompleteOptions
description: Static options used to call the {@link BoundChatCompleteAPI}

misc.label: BoundOutputAPI
description: Version of {@link OutputAPI} that got pre-bound to a set of static parameters

children.label: options
signature: { id: TId; input: string; schema?: TOutputSchema | undefined; retry?: { onValidationError?: number | boolean | undefined; } | undefined; abortSignal?: AbortSignal | undefined; system?: string | undefined; stream?: TStream | undefined; previousMessages?:

misc.label: BoundOutputOptions
description: Static options used to call the {@link BoundOutputAPI}

misc.label: ChatCompleteAPI
description:
Request a completion from the LLM based on a prompt or conversation.

By default, The complete LLM response will be returned as a promise.

children.label: options
signature: { connectorId: string; stream?: TStream | undefined; system?: string | undefined; messages:

misc.label: ChatCompleteCompositeResponse
description:
Composite response type from the {@link ChatCompleteAPI},
which can be either an observable or a promise depending on
whether API was called with stream mode enabled or not.

misc.label: ChatCompleteOptions
description: Options used to call the {@link ChatCompleteAPI}
signature: { connectorId: string; stream?: TStream | undefined; system?: string | undefined; messages:

misc.label: ChatCompleteStreamResponse
description:
Response from the {@link ChatCompleteAPI} when streaming is enabled.

Observable of {@link ChatCompletionEvent}

misc.label: ChatCompletionChunkEvent
description:
Chunk event, containing a fragment of the total content,
and potentially chunks of tool calls.

misc.label: ChatCompletionEvent
description:
Events emitted from the {@link ChatCompleteResponse} observable
returned from the {@link ChatCompleteAPI}.

The chatComplete API returns 3 type of events:
- {@link ChatCompletionChunkEvent}: message chunk events
- {@link ChatCompletionTokenCountEvent}: token count event
- {@link ChatCompletionMessageEvent}: message event

Note that chunk events can be emitted any amount of times, but token count will be emitted
at most once (could not be emitted depending on the underlying connector), and message
event will be emitted ex

misc.label: ChatCompletionMessageEvent
description:
Message event, sent only once, after all the chunks were emitted, and containing
the whole text content and potential tool calls of the response.

misc.label: ChatCompletionTokenCountEvent
description:
Token count event, send only once, usually (but not necessarily)
before the message event

misc.label: ChatCompletionTokenLimitReachedError
description:
Error thrown if the completion call fails because of a token limit
error, e.g. when the context window is higher than the limit
signature: .TokenLimitReachedError, { tokenLimit?: number | undefined; tokenCount?: number | undefined; }>

misc.label: ChatCompletionToolNotFoundError
description:
Error thrown if the LLM called a tool that was not provided
in the list of available tools.

misc.label: ChatCompletionToolValidationError
description:
Error thrown when the LLM called a tool with parameters that
don't match the tool's schema.

The level of details on the error vary depending on the underlying LLM.
signature: .ToolValidationError, { name?: string | undefined; arguments?: string | undefined; errorsText?: string | undefined; toolCalls?:

misc.label: FromToolSchema
description: Utility type to infer the shape of a tool call from its schema.
signature: ? FromToolSchemaObject<TToolSchema> : TToolSchema extends ToolSchemaTypeArray ? FromToolSchemaArray<TToolSchema> : TToolSchema extends ToolSchemaTypeBoolean ? boolean : TToolSchema extends ToolSchemaTypeNumber ? number : TToolSchema extends ToolSchemaTypeString ? FromToolSchemaString<TToolSchema> : never

misc.label: FunctionCallingMode
description:
Define the function calling mode when using inference APIs.
- native will use the LLM's native function calling (requires the LLM to have native support)
- simulated: will emulate function calling with function calling instructions

misc.label: InferenceTaskAbortedError
description:
Inference error thrown when the request was aborted.

Request abortion occurs when providing an abort signal and firing it
before the call to the LLM completes.

misc.label: InferenceTaskErrorEvent
signature: > & { error: { code: string; message: string; meta?: Record<string, any> | undefined; }; }

misc.label: InferenceTaskInternalError
description: Inference error thrown when an unexpected internal error occurs while handling the request.

misc.label: InferenceTaskRequestError
description:
Inference error thrown when the request was considered invalid.

Some example of reasons for invalid requests would be:
- no connector matching the provided connectorId
- invalid connector type for the provided connectorId

misc.label: Message
MessageOf
description: Utility type to get the mixin Message type of a {@link ToolOptions} type.

misc.label: Output
description: Task output of a {@link OutputCompleteEvent}

misc.label: OutputAPI
description: Generate a response with the LLM for a prompt, optionally based on a schema.

misc.label: OutputCompleteEvent
description: Completion (complete message) event for the {@link OutputAPI}
signature: .OutputComplete> & { id: TId; output: TOutput; content: string; }

misc.label: OutputCompositeResponse
description:
Composite response type from the {@link OutputAPI},
which can be either an observable or a promise depending on
whether API was called with stream mode enabled or not.

misc.label: OutputEvent
description: Events emitted from the {@link OutputEvent}.

misc.label: OutputStreamResponse
description: Response from the {@link OutputAPI} in streaming mode.

misc.label: OutputUpdateEvent
description: Update (chunk) event for the {@link OutputAPI}

misc.label: ToolCallsOf
description: Utility type to infer the toolCall type of {@link ChatCompletionMessageEvent}.

misc.label: ToolChoice
description:
Defines the tool invocation for {@link ToolOptions}, either a {@link ToolChoiceType} or {@link CustomToolChoice}.
- {@link ToolChoiceType.none}: the LLM will never call a tool
- {@link ToolChoiceType.auto}: the LLM will decide if it should call a tool or provide a text response
- {@link ToolChoiceType.required}: the LLM will always call a tool, but will decide with one to call
- {@link CustomToolChoice}: the LLM will always call the specified tool

misc.label: ToolMessage
description: Represents a tool invocation result, following a request from the LLM to execute a tool.
signature: .Tool> & { name: TName; toolCallId: string; response: TToolResponse; } & (TToolData extends undefined ? {} : { data: TToolData; })

misc.label: ToolMessageOf
description: Utility type to get the Tool message type of a {@link ToolOptions} type.

misc.label: ToolSchema
description: Defines the schema for a {@link ToolDefinition}

misc.label: ToolSchemaType
description: A tool schema property's possible types.

misc.label: UnboundChatCompleteOptions
description: Options used to call the {@link BoundChatCompleteAPI}

misc.label: UnboundOutputOptions
description: Options used to call the {@link BoundOutputAPI}
signature: { id: TId; input: string; schema?: TOutputSchema | undefined; retry?: { onValidationError?: number | boolean | undefined; } | undefined; abortSignal?: AbortSignal | undefined; system?: string | undefined; stream?: TStream | undefined; previousMessages?:

misc.label: UserMessage
description: Represents a message from the user.
